casebody.data:
No. 2346. Latimer v. Mahaffey.

November Term, 1888.

February 8, 1889. Perry Heyward, for appellants. Irwine $ Mooney, contra.

Opinion by

Mr. Chiee Justice Simpson,

This case was the same as Latimer v. Sullivan, ante 111, in so far as the demurrer to the counter-claim and the motion to refer, were involved; and the rulings upon those points in that case were adopted as the decision of this. Judgment of Circuit Court (Norton, J.) affirmed.
